title: Can we have an option to give gold to allies?
body: This will add another layer of strategy to the game. Let's say that I finished shopping for items and I am left with 300 gold, I can give that gold to my struggling midlaner or jungler to help them catch up. There should also be an option to request gold from allies.

Buying items on the support become nothing but a dream.

After T1 Gold Item, Sightstone and Boots of Speed, your gold will just be funneled to the ADC.

That is called putting all your eggs in one basket, remember if the team made yas very strong, the rest of the team will be very weak.

Not really. He would be a monster and hit full build by 20 min. After that he can dump the absurd amount of gold he gets from stomping to the rest of the team. 

The way leagues itemization works means that putting all your eggs in 1 basket isn't actually a bad idea. Due to level scaling and the such. A full build yasuo at 20 min would be able to kill a squishy in a single q. Add in the ballerina effect on his dash q. This makes him able to kill 2-3 targets in 1 q. Then the other 2 are easy pickings.

The ability to funnel gold into a carry is a terrible idea

Let's not forget about those Champs that you need to focus early to keep down so that you have a few min of breathing room before they become hyper carries. Junglers would be pointless. Camped the Vayne so she would be kept down. For 30 min? Too bad. Her team gave her gold and made all that effort to keep the hyper carry down completely pointless.
Wrecked all 5 lanes funnel to him lol.

A good idea in theory, but it would break the meta and add an unbelievably massive amount of toxicity to lower ELOs.

Your resident tryhard garbage {{champion:157}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:202}} would demand everyone give them all their gold, and flame and cry.

Also meta disruption: What would happen is everyone would pump their gold into one early-game snowballing champion, so each team would be 4 supports assisting one overfed god, and LoL basically turns into Titanfall.
That sounds like a terrible idea. Fed carry could just give gold to allies to put them ahead as well.
I would be ok with this.
